requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Uses WebView2. If not installed, HellEscape should request Windows to install automatically.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

results.name: Hunted In Space: Return To Utorone
